import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { getCountriesById} from '../../redux/actions'; const Detail = (props) => { const dispatch= useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getCountriesById(props.match.params.id)); },[dispatch, props]) const detail = useSelector((state =>state.detail)) console.log(detail) return (
{ detail.length > 0 ?

Name: {detail[0].name}

Capital: {detail[0].capital}

Continent: {detail[0].continent}

Subregion: {detail[0].subregion}

Area: {(detail[0].area/1000000).toFixed(2)} millones kmÂ²

Population: {detail[0].population}

{detail[0].activities.map((act) => (

  • {act.name} ({act.season}) | Duration:{' '} {act.duration} - Difficulty: {act.difficulty}

    • ))}

    :
    Loading
    }
    ) } export default Detail
